name: Crush and Roll - GMTK Game Jam 2022
name_original: Crush and Roll - GMTK Game Jam 2022
description:
CRUSH the number to collect your die faces

When the faces are completed, ROLL the die to damage your friend

Then, Eliminate your friend ENEMY !!!

Developed by Somnolent Team


P1  Move - WASD

        Crush - J

P2  Move - Arrow Keys

        Crush - 1

Some Info

GMTK Game Jam 2022 - Roll of the Dice
